```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

data("weather_df")
```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Scatter Plot


```{r}
weather_df |> 
  plot_ly(
  x = ~date,
  y = ~tmax,
  color = ~name,
  type = "scatter",
  mode = "markers+lines",
  alpha = 0.5
  ) 
```
